templates.name: Habit Tracker
templates.description: Track daily habits with streaks and progress charts
templates.prompt: A habit tracking app with daily check-ins, streak counters, weekly progress charts, and motivational reminders

templates.name: Expense Tracker
templates.description: Track spending, budgets, and savings goals
templates.prompt: A personal finance app for tracking daily expenses, monthly budgets by category, savings goals with progress, and spending analytics with charts

templates.name: Recipe Book
templates.description: Save and organize your favorite recipes
templates.prompt: A recipe collection app with categories like breakfast/lunch/dinner, cooking time, difficulty level, ingredient lists, step-by-step instructions, and a meal planner

templates.name: Workout Planner
templates.description: Plan workouts, track sets/reps, and monitor progress
templates.prompt: A fitness app with workout plans, exercise library with sets/reps/weight tracking, rest timers, body measurements log, and weekly workout summary

templates.name: Study Flashcards
templates.description: Create flashcard decks and study with spaced repetition
templates.prompt: A flashcard study app with custom deck creation, flip-to-reveal cards, spaced repetition scheduling, quiz mode with scoring, and study streak tracking

templates.name: Job Application Tracker
templates.description: Track job applications, interviews, and offers
templates.prompt: A job hunting tracker with application status pipeline (Applied, Phone Screen, Interview, Offer, Rejected), company details, interview notes, salary comparison, and deadline reminders

templates.name: Mood Journal
templates.description: Daily mood tracking with journaling and insights
templates.prompt: A mental health journal app with daily mood ratings (emoji picker), journal entries, mood trends chart over time, gratitude prompts, and breathing exercises

templates.name: Pet Care Tracker
templates.description: Track pet health, feeding, walks, and vet visits
templates.prompt: A pet care app for tracking feeding schedules, walk times and routes, vet appointments, vaccination records, medication reminders, and pet weight/growth charts

templates.name: Plant Care
templates.description: Never forget to water your plants again
templates.prompt: A plant care app with a plant collection, watering schedule and reminders, sunlight requirements, growth photo log, and care tips per plant species

templates.name: Book Tracker
templates.description: Track your reading list, progress, and reviews
templates.prompt: A reading tracker app with a bookshelf (reading, finished, want to read), page progress tracking, star ratings and reviews, reading stats (books/year, pages/month), and book recommendations

templates.name: Travel Planner
templates.description: Plan trips with itineraries, packing lists, and budgets
templates.prompt: A travel planning app with trip itineraries (day-by-day), packing checklists, budget tracker per trip, saved destinations with photos, flight and hotel details, and a trip countdown timer

templates.name: Mini Marketplace
templates.description: Buy and sell items locally
templates.prompt: A local marketplace app with product listings with photos and prices, category browsing, search with filters, seller profiles with ratings, favorites/wishlist, and chat with seller

templates.name: Event Planner
templates.description: Organize events with guest lists and checklists
templates.prompt: An event planning app with event creation (date, venue, theme), guest list with RSVP tracking, task checklist, budget breakdown, vendor contacts, and countdown to event

templates.name: Meditation & Mindfulness
templates.description: Guided meditation sessions and breathing exercises
templates.prompt: A meditation app with guided session library (5-30 min), breathing exercise timer, daily meditation streak, sleep sounds, mood check-in before/after, and mindfulness stats

templates.name: Portfolio Showcase
templates.description: Showcase your work with a beautiful mobile portfolio
templates.prompt: A professional portfolio app with project showcase gallery, about me section with skills and experience, client testimonials, contact form, and social media links

templates.name: Trivia Quiz Game
templates.description: Test your knowledge with fun trivia quizzes
templates.prompt: A trivia quiz app with multiple categories (Science, History, Pop Culture, Sports), difficulty levels, timed questions, score leaderboard, daily challenge, and achievement badges

templates.name: Property Finder
templates.description: Browse property listings with filters and favorites
templates.prompt: A real estate browsing app with property listings (photos, price, sqft, beds/baths), search with filters (price range, type, location), favorites/saved list, property detail with map, and mortgage calculator

templates.name: Playlist Manager
templates.description: Organize your music into smart playlists
templates.prompt: A music playlist manager with playlist creation, song library browser, now playing screen with album art and controls, recently played history, and listening stats

templates.name: Match & Meet
templates.description: Find your perfect match with smart profiles
templates.prompt: A dating app with swipe-based discovery, profile cards with photos and bio, match list, chat with matches, interest-based compatibility score, and profile settings with preferences

templates.name: News Reader
templates.description: Stay informed with a clean, personalized news feed
templates.prompt: A news reader app with personalized feed, category tabs (Tech, Business, Sports, Entertainment), article detail with reading time, bookmarks/save for later, and reading history with stats
